itemDisplayName: Azure SQL Server + multiple SQL DBs with Threat Detection
description: This template allows you to deploy an Azure SQL Server and a user-defined number of Azure SQL Databases with Threat Detection enabled, with an email address to receive alerts for each database.
summary: Deploy an Azure SQL Server with Threat Detection enabled and a user-defined number of Azure SQL Databases with Threat Detection enabled, with an email address to receive alerts for each database.
